SELECT mext.id, mext.commit, mext.group, mext.name, mext.tree, mext.owner_id, mext.visibility, mext.begin_time, mext.end_time, mext.operator_id FROM mm_m_ext mext, mm_m_pub mpub WHERE mpub.pub_set = #{set} AND mpub.ext_id = mext.id
AND mext.end_time IS NULL
AND mext.end_time >= #{endTime} ORDER BY mext.begin_time DESC LIMIT 0, 1
GROUP BY mext.id
